title: Countries with the highest rates of autism among children worldwide as of 2018
yAxis: Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Portugal.
The difference of Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied between the highest and lowest Country is 158.8.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Portugal.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Portugal.
The highest Country United States has 158.8 more Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied than the lowest Country Portugal.
The Country United States has the highest Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied, followed by Japan, and Canada. Down to the Country Portugal which is the lowest.
Similar Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is found in Country United Kingdom, and Ireland.
The highest value 168.0 at United States is almost 1.86 times larger than the average value 90.22.
